message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe we can reach a fairer price. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your perspective, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and am willing to pay $16,000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
